items: Assisting in the establishment of a domestic or a foreign investment company

Ensuring the completeness and compliance in accordance with the prevailing laws and regulations for the purpose of the submission of a client’s license application to the relevant government authorities based on the client’s business area
Representing or accompanying a client in a negotiation with its business partners or in attending a General Meeting of Shareholders (GMS)
Assisting clients in the preparation of legal documents in relation to the client’s daily business activities
Legal due diligence of the applicable laws and regulations prior to the client conducting a corporate action
Legal consultation in relation to proceedings and/or various legal issues currently faced by a client
Analyzing and providing legal advice in relation to legal proceedings currently faced by a client
Acting for and on behalf of a client in settling civil disputes often faced by clients
Acting for and on behalf of a client in responding to legal notices addressed to such client
Representing a client as a plaint if / applicant or as a defendant / respondent in civil trials or in arbitrational proceedings
Assisting clients that are called to be witnesses in a criminal proceeding
Providing legal assistance to clients who are already suspects / accused in a criminal proceeding since the investigation stage through the trial stage
Assisting clients in filing a police report in relation to a criminal activity experienced by a client
